Back to list

Transcription for 37492

A

I attended a School of Erwen primary school, which was the Welsh medium primary school in Cymarthen.
It was the only, and still is, the only Welsh medium school in the town.
It hadn't struck me until I reached secondary school how large the school was.
It had 300 or so children, so it was quite a large school.
But at the time, I hadn't realised its size.
Within the classroom, we had a blackboard.
Certain classrooms had a revolving blackboard, which was posh in comparison with one blackboard on the wall.

B

I attended a Scwla Dderwen primary school which was the Welsh medium primary school
in Cymraeddyn.
It was the only, and still is the only, Welsh medium school in the town.
It hadn't struck me until I reached secondary school how large the school was.
It had 300 or so children, so it was quite a large school.
But at the time you hadn't realised its size.
Within the classroom we had a blackboard.
Certain classrooms had a revolving blackboard which was posh in comparison with one blackboard
on the wall.

C

I attended a school of their own primary school,
which was the Welsh medium primary school in Carmarthen.
It was the only, and still is, the only Welsh medium school in the town.
It hadn't struck me until I reached secondary school how large the school was.
It had 300 or so children, so it was quite a large school.
But at the time, I hadn't realised its size.
Within the classroom, we had a blackboard.
Certain classrooms had a revolving blackboard,
which was posh in comparison with one blackboard on the wall.
